title: Devastating Earthquake Hits Nepal, Kills More Than 1,000
teaser: NPR's Arun Rath speaks with Kunda Dixit, a Nepali Times editor, about today's deadly quake. It caused an Everest avalanche and destroyed ancient monuments in and around the capital, Kathmandu.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
